projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

lg.l: kaṇḍūkarī jīvanāhvasvasaṃjñe dve pañcake gopasutā tripādī //
jīvakaḥ kūrcanibhas tu vṛṣāṇī vṛṣabho vṛṣaḥ //
triparṇy atiguhā saumyā mahākṣī tanvikā matā //
sugandhimūlā bhadrā ca sugandhā gopavally api //
chade hrasvas tailapuṣpas tulyas tu rasavīryataḥ //
spṛkkā jātyajamodahiṅgutruṭibhiḥ bhārṅgīvilaṅgānvitaiḥ ebhir viṃśatibhiḥ kaphāmayaharaḥ kṛṣṇādiko 'yaṃ gaṇaḥ //
ajājī jīrakaṃ mātā medhyaṃ syād auttarāpatham //
ambaṣṭhā sthāpanī vīrā bodhakī ca kucelikā //
spṛkkā spṛk brāhmaṇī devī piśunā ca latā satī //
ajamodā kharāhvā ca bastamodā ca markaṭī //
padmakapuṇḍrau vṛddhitugarddhayaḥ śṛṅgy amṛtā daśa jīvanasaṃjñāḥ /
varottamā ca triphalā śreṣṭhā cāpi phalatrayam //
nihanti kaphapittakuṣṭhajvarān viṣaṃ vamim arocakaṃ kāmalām //
dhānyā kustumburuḥ dhānyaṃ dhanikā dhānyakaṃ tathā //
kramukaṃ kaivukaṃ pūgaṃ kaṣāyaṃ madhur āhvayam //
darbhaḥ kuśo lavaḥ sthūlaḥ sūkṣmo vedapavitrakaḥ //
bhallūko bhūtavṛkṣaś ca śyonākaś caiva ṭuṇṭukaḥ //
pratyakpuṣpī pītatailodakīryā śvetāyugmaṃ tāpasānāṃ ca vṛkṣaḥ //
vṛkṣakaḥ śakravṛkṣaś ca vatsakaḥ kuṭajas tathā //
dīpyakaṃ tv ajamodas tu yavānī jaraṇāhvayā //
śuklā yā sā svādukandā suvāsā himasaṃbhavā //
niśā kṣapā ca rātriś ca varā lomaśamūlikā //
dārvī kaṭaṃkaṭerī ca parjanyā ca pacampacā //
sandhānīyau hitau pitte vraṇānām api ropaṇau //
niryāso yas tu śālmalyāḥ sa mocarasasaṃjñakaḥ //
kuṣṭhaṃ kuṭī haimavatī ca yonistanyāmayaghnā malapācanāś ca //
tiktā ca kaṭukā jñeyā rohiṇī kaṭurohiṇī //
pākalaṃ vāri bhāvyaṃ ca vāpyaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ gadāhvayam //
piṇḍī turuṣkajaṃ tailaṃ pirāyākaṃ kṛtrimaṃ kapiḥ //
dhyāmakaṃ śabalaṃ gandhaṃ spṛkkā devī latā satī //
varāṅgaṃ carmanāmā ca cocaṃ tvak ca varāṅgakam //
bahiṣṭhaṃ tagaraṃ vakraṃ nataṃ kālānusāri ca //
jātīraso raso bolaṃ śuktiḥ kararuho nakhaḥ //
kāśmīraṃ kuṅkumaṃ raktaṃ vāhlīkaṃ ghusṛṇaṃ varam //
kundurur medakaḥ kundro vijñeyaḥ khapuras tathā //
bastāntrī vyādhighāto bahalabahurasas tīkṣṇavṛkṣāt phalāni śyāmādyo hanti gulmaṃ viṣamarucikaphau hṛdrujaṃ mūtrakṛcchram //
suṣeṇikā śaśāhvā ca kālindī kālikā smṛtā //
kumbhastrī bhaṭṭinī sūtrā śyāmā kuṭaraṇā trivṛt //
anyeṣāṃ tu tathā brāhmī brahmanāmā tu kīrtitā //
tīkṣṇavṛkṣaḥ śaṇaḥ pīluḥ prokto 'nyaḥ sthāṇukas tathā //
tāny uktāny abhidhīyante viprakīrṇāny ataḥ param //
ajaṭā bahupattrā ca bhūdhātrī tāmalaky api //
vaṃśo veṇur yavaphalaḥ suparvā ca tṛṇadhvajaḥ //
malayūḥ vākucī caiva candrarekhā tv avalgujaḥ //
sahasravīryā golomī sitā dūrvā ca śādvalaḥ //
uccaṭā caṭakā jñeyā śikhaṇḍy āsphotakaḥ smṛtaḥ //
hiṅgupattrī tu pṛthvīkā bāṣpikā kavarī smṛtā //
agastiko munināmā kumbhayoniś ca sa smṛtaḥ //
urvāruḥ karkaṭī proktā lomaśā ca prakīrtitā //
śīghraśākhā śākhinī ca mahāśākaś ca vāstukī //
saumyagandhā barbarikā tilaparṇī ca sā smṛtā //
mṛdukāntiḥ mahāśvetā śvetā tu khaṭikā smṛtā //
anyat karparikā tutthaṃ vāmanaṃ tutthameva tu //
viḍaṃ tu kṛtrimaṃ proktaṃ pṛthvīsambhavam audbhidam //
śilāpuṣpaṃ tu śaileyaṃ śilājaṃ sthaviraṃ tathā //
samudraphenaṃ śuṣkaṃ ca phenaṃ vāridhijaṃ malam //
pravālaṃ vallijaṃ raktaṃ vidrumaṃ ca prakīrtitam //
jātarūpaṃ tathā hema śātakumbhaṃ ca hāṭakam //
ayorajo loharajas tat kiṭṭaṃ syād ayomalam //
viṣaṃ ca mūlakaṃ śṛṅgī garaṃ kṛtrimasaṃjñakam //
damanaḥ pāṇḍurāgaḥ syāt tathā gandhotkaṭo muniḥ //
dadhi māṅgalyakaṃ caiva saṃtānaṃ stanikā smṛtā //
sitopalā śarkarā ca sitā matsyaṇḍikā smṛtā //
prasannā vāruṇī jñeyā parisvinnā ca sā smṛtā //
mārdvīkaṃ madhu vijñeyaṃ mādhvīkaṃ madhunā kṛtam //
śuktaṃ sauvīrakaṃ ceti tuṣodaṃ tu tuṣodakam //
brahmāmbu gombu gomūtraṃ gomalaṃ gomayaṃ smṛtam //
yavaś ca sthūlamadhyaś ca varuṇo munibhikṣitaḥ //
dvipaṃ ca mūlaṃ daśakaṃ daśamūlaṃ daśāṅghrikam //
kalabho vāraṇo dantī mātaṃgo dvirado dvipaḥ //
hayo 'śvas turago vājī saptir vāhas tu bāḍavaḥ //
karabho dīrghagaś coṣṭraḥ kṣamī vesarako balī //
pañcāsyo mṛgarāṭ siṃho haryakṣaḥ kesarī hariḥ //
parabhūr balibhug dhvāṅkṣaś cirajīvī ca vāyasaḥ //
caṭakaḥ kalaviṅkaś ca kuliṅgaś caṭakāpi ca //
vanyastu gavayo jñeyaḥ kakudmān gopatir vṛṣaḥ //
raktaṃ śoṇaṃ māṃsakaraṃ śoṇitaṃ kṣatajam asṛk //
kardamaḥ paṅkajambālau mṛtsā mṛtsnā ca mṛttikā //
dharā dharitrī dharaṇī kṣoṇī jyā kāśyapī kṣitiḥ //
viśvambharā rasānantā gotrā kuḥ pṛthivī kṣamā //
sūro haṃso ravir bhānuḥ pataṃgo 'rko divākaraḥ //
savitā ca sahasrāṃśur mārtaṇḍaś ca vikartanaḥ //
gurur bṛhaspatir mantrī cośanā bhārgavaḥ kaviḥ //
śambhur īśaḥ paśupatiḥ śivaḥ śūlī maheśvaraḥ //
tvak carma valkalaṃ proktaṃ viṭapaḥ śikharaṃ śiraḥ //
pallavastu pravālaḥ syāt mukulaṃ korakaṃ smṛtam //
prasūnaṃ sumanaḥ sūnaṃ puṣpaṃ ca kusumaṃ smṛtam //
kriyā cikitsitaṃ śastraṃ prāyaś cittaṃ samāhitam //
rogajño jīvano vidvān āyur vedī gadāntakaḥ //
